full_summary:
# F1782-23C073 - CCGS M. Charles and CCGS Captain Goddard Refits

## Request for Proposal (RFP): Refit and Drydocking of CCGS M. Charles and CCGS Captain Goddard

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the refit and drydocking of the Canadian Coast Guard Ships, CCGS M. Charles and CCGS Captain Goddard.

### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference**: WS4035796235
* **Publication Date**: June 16, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 28, 2023 at 14:00:00 (AST)
* ** Amendments**: 7
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 18, 2025

### Project Overview

The Canadian Coast Guard requires a contractor to carry out the drydocking and refit of the CCGS M. Charles and CCGS Captain Goddard. This project involves the refit of two vessels and includes the following scope of work:

* Drydocking of CCGS M. Charles (September 27, 2023 to December 20, 2023)
* Refit of CCGS M. Charles (September 27, 2023 to December 20, 2023)
* Drydocking of CCGS Captain Goddard (October 23, 2024 to December 18, 2024)
* Refit of CCGS Captain Goddard (October 23, 2024 to December 18, 2024)

### Additional Information

* **Bidders’ Conference and Site Visit**: An optional bidders’ conference and site visit is available for potential contractors.
* **Sourcing Strategy**: The sourcing strategy for this project will be limited to suppliers in Western Canada.
* **Trade Agreements**: This project will be conducted under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contact Information

* **Procurement Officer**: Torrey Buchan, PSPC
* **Email**: torrey.buchan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16611095?extsite=MTY2MTEwOTVfQU4wMTQ4N
